Text:
+1. Thanks VTV! Enjoyed the episode.

Anyways, not spamming just saying i have officially uploaded all of "The.Office U.S. Season 1-8" in 720p quality! Just a tip if you haven't seen any of the old ones!

long live TPB!
long live VTV!
So pumped for this episode. Got so damn excited at the end of the last episode. Couldn't think of a better way to set up the finale.

HBO IS tracking the torrent so you might very well get an unpleasant surprise from your ISP (depending what country you're in, naturally). I don't mean to discourage seeding, but all Office episodes can be streamed through the-office.vyrantstudios.comin in HD if you register like on piratebay.
Sorry, in the comment above I meant to write: the-office.vyrantstudios.com ! Gotta look for alternatives like that, sadly.
